segments.text: How do you like other films starring Charlie Chaplin ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I like others very much , but I really don't think much of this one .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You don't like the performance , do you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , but I don't like the story .
segments.speaker: S2
